```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F)

library(dplyr)
library(DT)

```

```{r, echo=F}
incomparable_wide <- readRDS("data/incomparable_wide.rds")

incomparable_wide %>%
  arrange(desc(date)) %>%
  select(-podcast, -year, -month, -weekday, -summary) %>%
  datatable(filter = "top", options = list(pageLength = 100), style = "bootstrap") %>%
  formatDate(columns = "date", method = "toLocaleDateString") %>%
  formatRound(columns = "duration", digits = 2)
```
